manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Organic Pads Hypoallergenic Free from harsh chemicals, chlorine and pesticides, the MYBOXSHOP pad is great for sensitive skin. Organic Cotton Top Sheet The MYBOXSHOP pad uses an organic cotton top sheet that minimizes irritation while maximizing protection. Thin and Breathable Offering absorption and comfort, these pads will make you a lifelong user after your first time.

Organic Panty Liners Organic cotton top sheet The MYBOXSHOP liner uses an organic cotton top sheet to protect your skin and keep you dry. Hypoallergenic Free from harsh chemicals, chlorine, bleach and pesticides, the MYBOXSHOP liner is great for sensitive skin. Thin and breathable This ultra-thin layer offers protection for lighter days, spotting, or to be paired with a tampon or menstrual cup. The MYBOXSHOP liner is designed to meet your unique needs and move with you throughout your day.

Organic Tampons with Free Applicator Pure Organic Cotton Organic cotton free from dyes, pesticides, microplastics and bleach. Minimizing irritation and allergens. BPA-Free Applicator Our applicator is non-toxic to the most permeable part of your body. And it's easy to use. Eight-Channel Absorption Our organic cotton tampon expands width-wise, maximizing protection and stays secure as you move.

Menstrual Cup Medical Grade Silicone Our menstrual cups are made of 100% medical grade silicone. This means absolutely no chemicals bleaching into your body. Reusable Cup This is a reusable diva cup product with zero waste. That means you won’t have to shop once a month. Ultra Soft We designed our period cups to fit your body and control any type of flow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbs fully & evenly, no leak issues
reviews.reviewText: I’m trying the various organic tampons. I really like these, not sure why there would be a difference but I noticed on another brand I got from Whole Foods I have leaked a couple times and sorry to be graphic but when removing the tampon it actually wasn’t fully absorbed with blood, just one line of the tampon had blood and it seemed to leak. These tampons absorb evenly and fully with blood so premature leaking.THANK YOU Amazon/my box shop for now supplying applicator free tampons. There was only the applicator version of these for a while and I prefer non applicator to be more sustainable.Sorry to preach but I highly encourage women to switch to non applicator or give it a try. I really think once you get used to it it’s very convenient. Also more compact, I keep them in my little wallet pouch..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who knew organic would really make a difference?!
reviews.reviewText: With other (non organic companies)- I am a “lites” personally, others hurt.. However, I have given these a try and “regular” with MySoapBox organic has been wonderful so far. No issues like I normally would and I can actually go about my day without that feeling of anything in place and very comfortable. Hold well, discreet packing, and organic!! Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, noisy wrapper.
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! I I love knowing I am only putting a natural, heathy product into my body and not having to wonder what chemicals are in it. My one and only complaint is that the girl in the stall next to me has to assume I’m eating a snickers bar when I open it. The wrapper is pretty crinkly. Small price to pay for your health but I really hope this can be fixed. I will continue to purchase them anyway but discretion is something I value too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used pads by this brand in the past. This was my first time using their tampons. I generally don’t use them, but due to a vacation I needed to. I was pleasantly surprised. They are just as good as the pads and a great alternative to the garbage in drug stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great! Make the switch to organic!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn’t tell a difference between these and leading brands like Playtex. Great overall! The applicator is a little funky (you have to pull back part of it because it’s compact with packing) but once you figure it out, it’s no problem!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I never New tampons could be so bad
reviews.reviewText: Worst tampons I’ve ever used! I hate to be negative but I’m just wanting to warn y’all, from the applicator to absorbency, I never knew a tampon could be so bad! This product does not absorb much compared to other brands of organic tampons I have used. I constantly dealt with leaking with these and was very nervous about what clothes I would wear with them. Probably my least favorite aspect of this product was the applicator. It's a terrible pain in the butt! More often than not It did not work properly and It was almost ALWAYS an awkward two-handed Jimmy rig to get the thing in! I have been pretty neutral towards tampons my whole life I have even used UB and not been bothered but I literally could not wait to get new ones the very sight of them bother me and I cannot believe this product was approved for sale! Anywho I would recommend L. organic tampons (I know you can get them at target) I could not wait to get back to them, they are more affordable and overall a much better product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I bought these based on all the 5 star reviews. I’m trying to be more aware of what goes on and in my body, so I got these tampons to try because they’re organic cotton. They’re very comfortable and can’t even tell they’re there, I like that a lot, especially since I’m on the move a lot and work with horses. They do absorb pretty well, obviously still wear a liner(I used the same brand liner- love them!) My biggest issue is the applicator, it is awful! It’s very flimsy and hard to push so usually it takes 2 hands and that’s awkward. I’ve had a few that won’t even push out all the way and come back out with the applicator, that’s a waste! These aren’t cheap.. I don’t know if I’ll buy them again or not. I may experiment with a few other brands first. 3 stars for the tampon itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: After using these there's no going back to any other brand. Comfortable and no irritation.
